content: used loops & threads impeccable white ~14 yd and misty blue ~10 yd small pompom you can make one yourself which i did with using the fork method hat yarn a white and yarn b blue starting with yarn a crochet in continuous rounds round 1 make a magic_ring single_crochet x6 6 round 2 single_crochet x6 6 round 3 increase single_crochet x2 increase 8 change to yarn b on last single_crochet round 4 single_crochet increase repeat around 12 round 5 single_crochet 12 12 round 6 single_crochet change to yarn a increase single_crochet x5 increase 18 round 7 single_crochet change to yarn b single_crochet x2 increase single_crochet x2 chain 6 skip 2 st single_crochet increase single_crochet x3 chain 6 skip 2 st single_crochet half_double_crochet 19 + 12 chain * round 8 half_double_crochet x5 single_crochet single_crochet x6 on chain single_crochet x10 single_crochet x6 on chain single_crochet half_double_crochet 30 round 9 single_crochet change to yarn a single_crochet increase single_crochet x2 x4 single_crochet x8 single_crochet x2 increase x2 single_crochet x2 36 round 10 half_double_crochet x2 single_crochet x34 36 finish off with slip_stitch and weave in tail attach pompom to top *if you place the ears at different positions you may to edit round 7 so that that beanie fits appropriately scarf yarn b blue with some yarn a white for the fringe crochet in row & turn round 1 chain 54 starting in 2nd st from the hook single_crochet 52 chain 1 turn 52 round 2 blo single_crochet 52 52 finish off with slip_stitch and weave in tail add fringe by looping 1 5 pieces of yarn a on the edges you can adjust chain length if you want longer or shorter scarf bowtie yarn b blue round 1 make a magic_ring chain 3 tc x2 slip_stitch tc x2 chain 3 slip_stitch tighten magic_ring and leave long tail to wrap around center & knot leave enough length so it can tie around the squirrel s neck as well or you can make a chain 32 and attach bow to the center finished squirrels with some variations in the faces colors tail length and arms  orange squirrel = longer tail different muzzle more oval nose lightly stuffed arms  chocolate squirrel = different muzzle smaller nose shorter ears slightly bigger feet  brown squirrel = per pattern have fun designing your squirrel to your liking
